content.detailedDescription:
This is an update from a previously submitted report.  

on sunday, may 2, 2010 at approximately 9:40 p.M. my husband and i were on our way back to our home in southwest austin. while driving down latta rd. we both noticed two bright amber lights beneath a large object in the night sky. the lights appeared to be around 4-5 blocks in distance from each other. the entire end of the object that was closest to our direction was approximiately 200 - 300 ft. across.  my husband stopped the car and we both stepped out to get a better look. the object continued to glide northward in the sky. the object seemed to be about 300 ft. from the ground and floated noiselessly. the object blacked out the night sky behind it. another car came up behind us so we jumped back in the car and turned back to follow the object but soon lost sight of it. the object did not bear usual markings of explained aircraft.  we tried taking photos of the object with our cell phones but were unsuccessful.  after scouring web sites i have finally come across an image of an object that looks like what we saw.  the object that was seen by j.S. henrardi over belgium (triangle) looks exactly like what we saw here in austin.  [link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Black triangle with amber lights seen over austin in night sky

content.detailedDescription:
While hanging-out in the parking lot of patch reef park in boca raton last night after a softball game. three of us saw a craft with four star like lights traveling from south to north from broward county over palm beach county and out of sight.
the whole sighting was no more or less than 10 seconds. the three of us saw a craft that had no blinking lights, no wings and no other discernible features other than three lights in the form of a triangle with one other light directly in front of the top light in the triangle. picture a triangle and then draw a straight line from the top of that triangle.
the body of the craft essentially had the same color and looked like the rest of the night sky.
it was traveling at a high rate of speed and made no sounds.  it was nothing that any of the three of us had ever seen before.

i'd only be willing to release my contact info on a case by case situation.
content.summary: Four lights in the sky traveling s to n at a high rate of speed with no sound.

content.detailedDescription: I am not sure of the exact date, but it seems around the fall of 1976. while returning home from grocery shopping around 8:30-9:00pm with my mother, i was traveling south on rt.130 and crossing the bridge over the rancocas creek near bridgeboro road when my mother, who was sitting in the passenger seat, noticed and brought to my attention something sitting above the water in close proximity next to the bridge on her side of the car. i slowed up, after checking that there was no traffic behind me, and there was none on the bridge at all, i almost brought the car to a slow stop as i approched the top of the bridge and noticed, through the front windshield and to my right, a craft of some kind within 200' of the right side of the bridge, just hovering in a stationary position about 70' above the waters surface. it stood there motionless with no apparent sound emanating from the object. the windows of the car were closed, but if it were a helecopter that close i'm sure we would of heard the sound and probably would of felt the buffeting effect from the rotors. as i observed the the object through the front windshield i could clearly see that the object was round in shape and typical of what would be described as a "flying saucer" in description. even though it was dark out, it was round in shape with a gray color metallic surface. the exterior of the craft i could discern, because there was a series of lights, that were yellowish in color around the circumference of the craft that sort of  glowed around the crafts surface so i was able to make out the features of the craft. there was a round lower bottom section of the craft, then another smaller diameter round section on top of that bottom section that had a series of lights in a row around it with what appeared to be a dome shape above that section which appeared to be transparent with some kind of windows that went around the dome. it appeared that i could see a figure or a form of something in the dome section of the transparent dome bubble top. the craft appeared to be about the size of a trailer which a tractor trailer would pull. the object then started to slowly ascend and as it did the lights seemed to rotate around the craft and the faster the craft ascended the lights seemed to rotate faster. the object ascended and crossed slowly over the bridge in front of us and headed east and appeared to follow the creek. at this time, as it crossed over the bridge, i was still moving slowly forward in the car. as it moved from my right to my left over the bridge, i got my last look of it behind and to my right as it appeared to follow the rancocas creek. this was a very frightening experience for the both of us and something that is just as vivid today as it was that night. i was told, latter that week, that there was a newspaper article, which i did not see, that was published the following day about an unexplained object that was seen near lumberton that same night. when my brother-in law approached me about writing this report, i told my boss about it and he said he had a relative who lives near the rancocas creek in lumberton and saw an object that same night near his home. i have his name as well.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Observed unknown craft hovering next to bridge within 200'

content.detailedDescription: The top description pretty much covers it, i have seen these several times last year and reported once on this site.  i don't know what it is, nor does anyone that lives around here.  they are basically very large orange orbs that turn on and off, and don't move, they seem to do something like a hyperjump, if that makes sense, one turns off as another turns on, they don't fizzle out they just shut off instantly as another lights up, i have seen this phenomenon while it was still rather light outside, and you cant see anything when they shut off, no object, no smoke trail, nothing.  this event was brighter than i have seen in the past, so i thought i would report it and see if anyone else has seen it.  my in-laws also seen the tail end of the event but they will be heading back to hawaii so i have not included them in the report, however if it turns out to be necessary i am sure they would talk with you.
content.summary: Bright orbs that seem to jump around in the sky without moving, they seem to move instantly or teleport or something, hard to explain, it is like they multiple lights are playing leap frog and the one they jump over disappears.

content.detailedDescription: Tottally crazy nobody will call me back email or anything even mufon is this a total denial? i really hope someone can see this before i end up missing or somthing!!!!!
content.shape: Boomerang,   Chevron,   Circle,   Cylinder,   Diamond,   Disc,   Flash,   Oval,   Square,   Rectagular,   Triangle,   Other
content.summary: Still goin on 4 days and still ignored

content.detailedDescription:
First: i had reported a previous sighting to paranexus minutes before i saw this happen.

 after making the above report that occurred on march 11, i went outside to smoke and looked at the stars/skywatched for about 15 minutes and was about to go back into my shop but leaned up against my door looking north just for a few more minutes when very suddenly my peripheral vision caught something in the northeast. i turned to look and was astounded to see a large object falling. i thought i had luckily caught a metiorite but it was falling slower than a metiorite and at a much steeper angle than i expected, so i watched it fall with flames trailing and was actually fearful because it looked like it landed between my town and the next one to the east. i say fearful because everything is so dry here. i almost looked like it could be an aircraft. the flames engulfed the object and trailed long on the end to my left, got smaller in the middle and trailed not quite as long on the other end.I lost sight behind trees and homes close to me, so i couldn't see it hit the ground.  i actually said "whoa" outloud. i debated what i should do for about two or three minutes, and finally decided to get in my truck and see if i could find it or see any fire/police vehicles. i saw nothing except a few civilian trucks just off of the highway that might have been looking for it, but i didn't know if anyone else saw it. on the way home, i stopped and reported what i saw to the county sheriff because of fire potential. i came home and watched the sky for any planes or helicopters and listened for sirens...Nothing. i don't know what else to say but i don't think this was a trivial event. maybe it landed or hit further than i thought, but i don't think so. i am a retired navy/government aircraft mechanic and have seen many metiorites. i have no idea what this was.
content.summary: Large flaming object falling from the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Was going north on dexham rd. toward hwy. 66 in rowlett. saw the object when looking to my left while i was driving. object seem to appear when i was about half way between miller rd. and hwy. 66 (lakeview prky.)my wife who was with me saw it at the same time i did. at first thought it was a meteor, but realized it was bigger than any meteor i had seen before and it had an oval or oblong shape and was white in color with what appeared to be light fragments moving in front of the bigger object. the object appeared to be heading in a downward trajectory and disappeared over the horizon very quickly. our children who were with us and riding in the back seat did not see it at all even though my wife and i inquired if they saw what we had seen.   

my feelings were of awe and curiosity as i've never seen anything that looked like what i saw.
content.summary: Bright white oblong shaped object almost size of the moon. moving from south to north very fast.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my wife were outside doing our usual horse training exercises.
 i decided to bring my binoculars and tripod so i could do some star
 gazing as well. as i was setting up my wife near our garage asked
 me something, i looked up to the west and noticed a star like object
 that looked out of place. there are not alot of stars out in that direction 
 where the magnitude is above a 1 or 2.
 the object was quite bright and stationary. in perhaps 5 seconds, 
 brightened slightly
 and then faded out completely. the feel of the event was "yep, that 
 was something." 
 i jumped online to see where the iss was (not even going over n.America
 presently), no space shuttle or satellites.
 the event was short but impressive.
 
 event occured at 8:18pm
 duration lasted about 5 seconds.
content.summary: Looking to the west, object illuminated then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Well, once again, strange things in the sky, very close, under a mile or so in the distance, i see a comet like object very bright white light that gets larger, maybe up to basketball size, then form a tail and begin to decrease in size and turn into a perfect brilliant green sphere and quickly turn small and disintegrate before ever reaching ground. it was so fast that by the time i could open the door for my daughter to see it had gone..Anyone else see this happen?
content.summary: Strange comet flies through sky

content.detailedDescription: I came home from class and walked out on to our apartments balcony where my roommate was.  when i got out there i thought i saw a shooting star so i told my roommate who stood up to look at it too.  however, it was not like any shooting star any of us have ever seen.  it was traveling over i-30 faster than any jet that either of us have ever seen.  it was egg shaped and bright green and then instantly turned into a bright red/orange color and then seemed to go a little lower and then disappeared.  the weird part about it, is that it did not really seem to have much of a tail at all. it probably lasted about 4-5 seconds.  we looked online and what we saw was described as a "green fireball" but the one we saw did not have a tail unlike some of the photos and videos that we had found.
content.summary: Green fireball

content.detailedDescription:
I was sky watching as i always do and suddenly out of nowhere a thin very bright white line approximately 2 to 3 inches long from my view and distance, was moving from south to north approximately 5 to 10 seconds moving quite fast no sound, suddenly stopped and as quick as it stopped it just dissapeared.
then 2 nights later the  march22nd 2011 i was outside sky watching i was looking at the big dipper when a faint bluish whitish very distant small glow was moving across the sky, it moved in a eastward direction i watched it for at least 30 secondes before it was so far away i could no longer see it.
i have a very clear and open sky to view every night and i am telling you there is something going on in the skies around me.
note: i live about 18 miles from naco mexico, about 10 miles from the border itself, im trying to give you a clear location of where i was seeing activity.
content.summary: Looking east thin white line crosses sky then suddenly dissapears.

content.detailedDescription:
Since the 2 reporting witnesses live in iowa, this missouri incident is being reported by investigator beverly trout, chief investigator for mufon in iowa.

while waiting for fireworks to begin on july 4, 2010, 5 adults were gathered at rockaway beach, missouri to watch the fireworks at 9:00 p.M.  it was heavy (astronomical) dusk, and they were waiting for dark (which occurred at 9:24 p.M.)  the crowd was in a park on the north bank of the white river, facing south looking out on the river when they saw a silent object slowly approaching.  they specify that a light on the underside looked fiery orange.  object passed within 1/4 mile or less to their right and after passing behind some trees, made an abrupt left turn and departed the area.  sighting lasted between 10-15 minutes, during which time the group commented and argued about what they were seeing.  see investigation report for more detail.
content.summary: Disk slowly approached from across white river & passed near group waiting fireworks to begin

content.detailedDescription: I saw the 4 craft about 300 yards from the road no more than 200 feet in the air over a large cow pasture and high far away in the sky i saw a bright light like a portal is a close as i can describe it. they were stacked 2 white red and white on the bottom. they had space in between them. there was no sound i could hear and they were hardly moving at all. they were gone in a split second.
content.summary: While driving i saw 4 craft 3 white 1 red shaped like large buses with stream line front

content.detailedDescription: I saw the lights in the sky again from my patio only they were in front of me this time. these arent the first  sightings i have had of the object(s). i have just decided to start speaking about it so maybe someone will tell what they are or at least come forward as a witness also.. about last nights sighting, instead of the object being behind my left shoulder as my prior sighting the night before, this one was in front of me in the nw sky and it wasnt as close as the sighting before. i didnt state how far away i thought the object was in last reported sighting but i will estimate it was up to one mile away, maybe closer but up to one mile. in the sighting i will say it was three times that far.  the objects are sometimes muliple in the sky, at different locations, just hovering, with multicolored lights that seem to go around the perimiter. i thought maybe its something that monitors the gas wells in the area, but dont know. i am scared to take a picture but if i get the nerve i will post one or send to mufon to view.
content.summary: Another report to go with yesterdays

This light looks come behind the cloud,camera shutter speed of 1/1000 of a second. 
this case is one of my long term visitation, more details from: *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).
content.summary: What is this rainbow color light?

content.detailedDescription: I was hunting saw all the cows running out of the field as fast as they could run. i went out in the field and there it was. hovering over a pond. it came towards me about 50ft. i got scared and ran to truck. but my truck would not start.I then went back in the field.I stood their allmost 2hrs. looking at them and they were i asume looking at me.No one belived me but i got a camara out of the truck and too a bunch of clear,sharp,100percent beatiful pictures.Gave 2 friends a picture one went to washington,d.C.They i was told they were real pictures.Gave one to my relative who works for the gov.Black opps.Pilot.He had the pictures check by experts the said it was real.You can even see the shodow on the ground in the pictures.Then me and my wife team drove 18 wheelers 1&1/2years on the road.All this time up to now a black aircraft follows me everywhere we go.I have to tell some one and show the pictures to the experts. people need to know there here....*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg),pls. call me and i will send you copies of them to show i'm telling the truth...My phone is being monitered who i don't know. i worked in the u.S.Army with satilights sending and reciveing messages when you hear what you just said on the phone and echo,, you will hear of what you just said.This i hear all the time now.Even to this day. i have the sharpest clear pictures i have ever seen anywhere.A lump in my right arm showed up two days latter.You can see where something was put under my skin.There is a round scar. i was sleeping in the living room chair one night,they came touched me.I saw them and they rubbed my leg and there mouth didn't move i herd a clear voice in my head say "you beatiful"i was awake looking at them at this time.I've had 20 or so times since then have missed time i can't explan still to this very day...Call with addres and i will fax or mail pictures..
content.summary: Walked up to 50ft. of them,have very sharp,pictures

content.summary: I do not feel comfortable just yet speaking on these events.

content.detailedDescription: I have to get back out and doccumeny. started 2days ago huge triangles and v widistortion feild hard to seengs some 3 blocks wide. have somesort of       .Black hellis

On march 11th 2011, i was taking my 11 year old girlfriends daughter to school. at about 9:15 am while traveling on joy lake road she said she saw a flying saucer out her window up above the tree line. she said she saw two objects one round red one and one oval gray one. both with a saturn like ring around them. she said the rings were the same color but darker. the ring on the red one was horizontal and the gray one vertical. she said they bounced off each other 3 times then suddenly stopped then vanished.

i would like to know if anyone else saw this. it was the day of the tsunami in japan.
content.summary: 11 year old see two ufos, one red and one grey with rings around them, crashing into each other.

content.detailedDescription: Well i have been seeing these objects for the past 6 months or more. they are usually just far enough away to question whether or not they are ufos but last night this one was closest it had ever been...Just about a day after i submitted my report on spinning orbs the object shows itself to me. its almost as if its letting me know its there because soon after i turned back to look at it over my left shoulder(my back was to the wall with the left side of my face to the outside of my patio) it totally disappeared. i turned to look at it about four times in a total of 5 minutes. i was feeling very uncomfortable so i went to let the dog out of my childs room to stay with me. i had woke my child when i opened the door and asked if he would come lay on a pallet near my bed. he knows i see these and he has seen them but cant confirm what they are either..As he got up i opened patio door to see if it was still there and of course it was but twice as far away sw direction of sky. just reappeared there. scares me a little but very curious about them..A cop in the town right next to us(where my kids go to school) reported the same thing some months ago??????
content.summary: Outside on apartment patio(second floor) saw object with colored lights flashing around perimeter

content.detailedDescription: You are not alone.I've been researching the ufo phenomena for 51 years and have extensive information on what you describe as watchers and blinkers.I refer to the larger craft as transport or motherships and the smaller craft as orbs or scout craft. both are visible to the trained, unaided eye. the transport craft are similar to our aircraft carriers in the respect that they both discharge smaller craft and, later, provide a landing site. i've identified 8 transport craft that discharge hundreds of scout vehicles nightly. watching this is both awesome and frightening, knowing the vast numbers but unaware of their intentions. i have an enormous amount of information that i will share with you and others on this site. thank you for submitting information about the watchers and blinkers.
content.summary: Response to minnesota watchers and blinkers

content.detailedDescription:
So i was standing in the back garden of my house for about half an hour since 8pm, and it was a clear, calm, mild night. i thought at first i witnessed a shooting star in the west south west direction as i was standing by the back door of my house. i thought, 'did i just see a shooting star? or was it just the bright star to the left of orion which was in the vicinity of west south west too'. i also heard one dog barking nearby just prior to witnessing this object.

not too long after this, i believed that i saw something round, shining or brightening up in the distance. i believe it was yellowish-orange in colour. i first thought it was just a chinese lantern rising up but i wondered how it would move with zero wind, and why is one floating about in march, that's why it got my attention. i felt sure that i witnessed a yellowish orb powering up or brightening up in the distance. anyway, something kept my attention so i made sure i paid attention to what it might do next.

i believe the actions and motions of the object made a steady motion towards me, in a straight line probably at a height of about 200 -300 feet, speed about 40 mph i would guess, and perhaps it descended slightly in height over its trajectory. at some point from watching this, i became aware that the object had changed or morphed into what i would describe as a light aircraft. i also heard the sound of what seemed to be an engine. i would describe this sound as a drone noise as opposed to a piercing or vibratory noise which i believe a real light aircraft would emit. i clearly remember that this object had a long, cylindrical light or beam, i believe in its centre, from front to  back. i think it was white, or maybe light turquoise. i also remember one light flashing which may have been yellow. it may also have had a small side light on each wing, i don't know the colours.

i sincerely cannot recall what shape it was, because i was surprised at the long thin white beam on the object, so i do not want to hazzard a guess. the object came over just to the left of my house, perhaps 100-150 feet above the ground. i just watched it fly past thinking, 'no way is that a plane, that is not a plane :)'. then i quickly moved to see if i could follow its trajectory as it passed by. i would say it went at a fair speed, say 40-50 miles per hour. i believe it covered a distance of about 1.5 to 2 miles from its start point to when i lost sight of it.

my feelings as i saw this was just that there was something not quite right about this scenario. one, because it was supposedly a light aircraft flying low over my house, and two, it was mid evening. so as it came nearer to my house i thought with a smile 'no way can this be a plane'. when i thought it could have been a ufo, i got a little anxious and nervouse at that point. i wondered if it could have been an a.I. controlled object, whether it knew i was standing below it, or even whether it put on some display for confirmation, i cannot answer the real motive here. other than what i have described i had no other reactions. i had a wry smile on my face watching it. so absolutely no telepathic communication going on, no electrical or radiological discharge or anything, no tractor beams, fancy light display, no missing time (i believe) or timelessness, no altered or heightened state like love or fear etc.

i finally lost sight of the object because it disappeard into the darkness in about 5 seconds. i don't know if it literally vanished, went invisible or shot off into the sky. i just can't believe noone else may have seen it. 

so what i remember most of all is this long thin white beam on the object and one flashing light, maybe yellow, and of course the sound of a light aircraft passing close at low altitude over my house. i cannot remember the shape of the object, nor the size, perhaps it was the size of a light aircraft.

the frustrating thing was, i did not have any instruments at hand to record it, view it or even signal to it. it caught me completely off guard. so i have no video or still photo as further evidence.
content.summary: Orb morphing into fake plane

content.detailedDescription:
Between mile marker 61 and 62 south of des moines, iowa and north of iowa/missouri state line where i am driving south on interstate 35. i noties low level lights of what at first look like a approching passenger airline flying low from a southeast flight path and heading northwest at a 45 degree angel north to interstate 35.
the craft was about 300 feet above the tree tops and flying very slow as if on a landing approch. it had non-blinking white lights on the ends of each tip of what at first look like wings and had two very large spot lights where the nose landing wheels should be, but the flood lights were not spoting forward like normal airliners. this was my first indication this was not a normal jetliner.
as the craft slowly approched 35, about 200 feet before the craft would had crossed over interstate 35 and over me, the craft quickly turned off the forward flood lights and made a hard bank right turn away from the highway (as if the pilot was saying "opps! wrong runway!"). when it banked i could see it was not a passenger airliner but a black triangle shaped flying wing with a boomerang shape leading edage. i would say it was a very large craft with a 250 to 300 feet wing span and about 325 to 350 feet long. the structure was not made from metal but more like a black dull composite fiberglass. it slowing flew away at a 45 degree angel northeast and i could see it had no vertical stabalizer nor any exhaust or sound from any engines. the side white marker lights never turned off but now i could see a set of red anti-collision light blinking off-center to the right of the flying wing as it flew away. i watch the flying wing make slight flight path ajustments as if they where looking for some new place to land. i noted the time of 5:54am and keep driving south on 35.
content.summary: Lost black flying wing faking as passenger jetliner.

content.summary: Are they birds?

content.detailedDescription: Me and my boyfriend were sitting on our back porch last night. we seen an obeject in the sky with blue lights. it was making radical movements that were unlike any airplane or helicoper i have ever seen (reversed directions very quickly), it was moving much faster also. the lights on it starting changing from blue to red. it was getting farther and farther away from us, then we seen it shoot streight down. it went behind the trees and we could no longer see it. if we see it again, we will let you know.
content.summary: Lighted object, too far to tell what shape, lights on it were too bright

content.detailedDescription: I am submitting this on behalf of a co-worker. she was on a farm near toefield, alberta and had decided to walk into the pasture to find her horse. she had her camera with her. she noticed a donut shaped object, brilliantly lit up, hovering over the pasture. she remembers that it may have had a dome on top. after watching it for a while, just hovering and not moving she took a picture of it. she was not afraid as at the time as she was wondering what it could be. it was not until after the event that she realized it was a ufo. she looked at the camera to see if it captured an image and indeed it did. picture attached. when she looked up to take another photo the object had disapeared.
content.summary: Toefield, alberta, canada - brilliant donut shaped object hovering over pasture

content.detailedDescription: Upon leaving mankato heading south, i noticed two higher altitude orbs, which i call watchers.  i video'd them for a bit, looking for movement.  i did get a surprise "skyflash" by a nearby watcher while taping.  it was a nice surprise, as it was my first captured skyflash, although skyflashes are very common as of late.  i continued on and taped probably five low altitude watchers which were under 100 feet, to my best estimations, and numerous blinkers.  some of the blinkers were spraying at low altitudes.  one was leaving a contrail at 4000 ft, according to the rangefinder.  very unlike conventional craft.  these particular watchers did not move while i taped them, but did later move slowly to the west, until i lost sight of them.  i will be putting those low altitude watchers on *youtube info moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg.  if you have questions please contact me, as i am very willing to share information on this subject.
content.summary: Ufozmankato youtube witness of two high altitude watchers, on skyflash

content.detailedDescription: Started taping at a usual location north of  mankato.  probably saw fifty or so in a few hours.  these watchers are plentiful.  this is just common activity.  it can be viewed by anyone from dusk until about midnight.  they are manipulating the weather in a big way, and can be seen in broad daylight if you know what to look for.  i am quite bored with them, but feel i need to keep documenting the activity, just in case the activity becomes more dire than it already seems.  i would hope to be able to at least warn people, if the activity becomes more ominous. please respond, if you are interested in investigating, as i have noticed an increase of low activity as of late. [youtube channel name removed/cm/tg].
content.summary: [youtube channel name removed/cm/tg] the sky was alight with watchers and blinkers-all silent

content.detailedDescription: This is one of hundreds of these that i have video taped during the last several months around minnesota see more on my youtube channel *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg)
content.summary: This is one of hundreds of these that i have video taped during the last several months around minnesota see more on my youtube channel *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms/sg).

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were camping at grapevine campground (~30 mi. n of silver city nm, in the gila wilderness)this past weekend. at 9pm my girlfriend asked me "wit's name deleted--cms/sg), what is that star-like light that is moving pretty fast directly overhead"?  my immediate reaction was that it was a satellite because it appeared to be very high in the sky, constant whitish light (no blinking lights, definitely not plane or helicopter), and moving at a steady, fast pace in an easterly direction.  we both agreed it was likely a satellite and watched it for about 2 minutes (from 12 oclock to about 2 oclock position).  then i noticed an object that looked identical to the "satellite" coming from the east (about 2 oclock position) and heading nw heading directly towards the supposed satellite (1st object we saw). although they did not collide, it appeared as though they were going to, but rather they passed each other forming an 'x'.  about 10 seconds later both objects vanished and we searched the skys but could not locate either of the objects. anbout 5 minutes later we did see 2 planes (looked to be air force fighter jets) that seemed to be almost searching for something in the last area we saw the objects in the sky.  it was a full moon this night.  we went to bed thinking what we saw "were not satellites, but rather ufos", as we had no idea what these objects were and were perplexed by how they seemingly met up in the sky and then dissappeared...No noise, no trails.  we are sure what we saw were not shooting stars, meteors, planes, helicoptors, etc.  it was a strange event, but we were not worried for our safety.  we are both very curious if anyone can shed some light on what exactly we may have seen this past weekend.  thanks, *(names deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: 2 satellites (?) converging high in sky then dissappear
content.locationName: Silver City/Gila Cliff dw, New Mexico
